proof of concept interface for a dynamic blockchain made of LLM prompts that are also NFTs with a changing real world value based on a second by second changing NFT market (show realtime graph). Users can add custom text prompts to the blockchain by paying a fee in beans. Users start with a random amount of beans. The value of a prompt is reported in beans. The value goes up and down based on the votes it receives. Users can buy prompts
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
